channel.title: Sumner Web Design - A portfolio site
channel.description: A portfolio site with work examples and collection of resources.

item.title: Pack 198
item.description:
I developed a web site for Cub Scout Pack 198 in Portland, Oregon. It was built using PHP and Sass with Compass. I utilized modern CSS such as flex boxes and gradients to create a modern, mobile first site.

I plan to integrate user registration for parents of scouts, photo and video upload by registered users, and a roster that is built from the registration information.

The site be placed on the pack’s domain once we have access to it.

Cub Scout Pack 198

item.title: Bible Word Study
item.description: Bible Word Study is a site I developed using the Joomla CMS and the Helix 3 framework. It is a full featured site with a forum, blog, calendar, and articles. The forum and calendars have a mix of private and public sections so private information can be shared with specific groups as well as having public interaction.

item.title: First Post
item.description:
This is the beginning of the adventure with Jekyll and GitHub’s hosting service.

The purpose of the site is twofold. First, it will serve as a portfolio. Second, I will use this as a repository for code snips.

I hope your find it interesting. Feel free to make additions in the comments.
